#id=1
#text=The other day , my best friend and I were riding to his house .
#id=2
#text=When we were almost there , I noticed that the front tire on my bicycle felt rather wobbly and was most likely flat .
#id=3
#text=I was in luck however , as my friend had a bicycle repair kit and some spare tires .
#id=4
#text=Once we arrived at my friend 's house , I asked my friend if he let me borrow his bicycle repair kit .
#id=5
#text=First , I turned the bike over and removed the front tire and tube .
#id=6
#text=Next I filled the tube with air to check where the tube was damaged , and found a small glass shard which had punctured through it .
#id=7
#text=After making ensure the tube was fully deflated , I repaired the puncture in the tube by using glue and applying a patch on top , then slid it back onto the tire using my hands .
#id=8
#text=Next , I placed and pushed the tire back onto the tube .
#id=9
#text=After which , I reconnected the tire onto the bicycle .
#text=Finally , I pumped air into the tire until it was filled up and the bicycle was ready to be ridden again .
